title: Pumpkin Patch
description: Immerse yourself in the mysterious world of a magical pumpkin farm, where pumpkins are so diverse and full of surprises that it's hard to tell one from the other! Your task is to carefully observe each pumpkin character and remember as many details as possible. Can you recognize and find two identical pumpkins among many others?
instructions: - At the beginning, one pumpkin will appear on the screen. Take a close look at it – remember its shape and other details. - When you're ready, click the "next" arrow. The pumpkin will disappear, and several new pumpkins will appear. Your task is to find the one you saw earlier. Select it by clicking on it. - It's worth recognizing all or as many pumpkins as possible, because at the end of the game, a special Halloween surprise awaits you!
developer: BobiBobi - Gry dla dzieci. Marcin Kustal

title: Checkers Deluxe Edition
description: It's a clash on the battlefield! Draw up your plan and defeat your opponents with finesse! It is also known as the draughts game, and it is an interesting test of strategy. Compete with an opponent and dominate their pieces as best you can. What happens when you manage to move a piece to the other end? Come play now and let's find out!
instructions: Take turns to move your pieces diagonally on the board. You can remove an opponent's piece by jumping over it if there is a space behind it. The goal is to remove all of your opponent's pieces from the field.

title: Princesses at Horror School
description: In this game you will meet two charming monster girls who study at a school for young monsters. Every morning, the girls carefully think over their images, mixing elements of a classic princess and a creepy monster. Girls have different fashion preferences, but they have one thing in common - these two unusual girlfriends always attract the admiring glances of classmates. After all, they are not just princesses, but real monsters whose terrifying style makes even the bravest tremble!
instructions: We help two girls-students of an unusual educational institution, prepare for Halloween: we apply bright makeup; create complex hairstyles with colorful strands and choose terribly beautiful tops, skirts and dresses from the wardrobe. The result can be saved as a PNG image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Space Survivor
description: Play Space Survivor online for free.  game.
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Space Shift
description: It's a game where you travel in space for as long as possible without hitting any obstacles- meteorites or missiles. Your ship moves automatically and you can slow it down to ensure it doesn't hit anything. There are different galaxies to travel through different in appearance and the type of obstacles to appear. If you travel far enough, you may encounter even an alien ship!
instructions: Windows-Press space to slow down, control to use secondary ability. Android/Touch-Touch Left side of the screen to slow down, Right side to use secondary ability.

title: Little master of assembly
description: The gameplay of this game is puzzle assembly type, mainly according to the room suggested by the picture, according to the objects in the room, the use of parts to splice the room objects
instructions: The main gameplay click on the furniture of the room and then the entire room parts are assembled
developer: Shenzhen haikuo yuntour rede tecnologia co., LTD

title: G Wagon City Driver
description: Dive into city driving with four game modes. Navigate busy morning streets, managing fuel and realistic traffic. Venture beyond the city to tackle rugged offroad terrain. Stunning morning graphics bring the city and landscapes to life, while unpredictable pedestrians and police chases add excitement. Customize your G-Wagon's look and performance, and enjoy the ride with your loyal dog. Whether evading cops or exploring trails, G-Wagon City Driver offers a thrilling experience.
instructions: W, A, S, D/Arrow Keys: Drive/Steer/Brake Left Shift: Nitro C: Change Camera G: Slow Motion

title: Spooky Link
description: Spooky Link is a relaxing Halloween-themed game where you connect matching spooky tiles. Tap a tile, then tap its match. If the path between them has two or fewer turns, the tiles are cleared. Each cleared tile creates more space to connect others. Enjoy many levels of fun with Halloween surprises!
instructions: Tap or click on a spooky tile, then find and select its matching tile. If the path between them has two or fewer turns, they will be cleared. Clear all tiles to complete the level. Use your mouse or touchpad to play!

title: Farm Triple Match
description: Looking for a fun tile-matching puzzle game? Try Farm Triple Match, a fresh take on tile-matching for puzzle lovers! This mahjong-inspired game is easy to learn but offers exciting challenges. Beat levels and build your own farm with cute animals and a lovely garden. Classic gameplay with a modern twist for relaxing brain training. Explore a variety of tiles featuring fruits, veggies, animals, and more. Use boosters to conquer tough puzzles and keep progressing. No time limits—play anytime!
instructions: Match three tiles in a row by removing them from the board and adding them to the bottom of the screen. You can only select tiles that have no others stacked on top of them. Be strategic to avoid running out of space in your collection row! If you get stuck, use a booster to help. Play with your mouse or touchscreen.

title: Crazy Axe
description: In Crazy Axe, you take control of a fearless warrior, armed with a powerful axe, to conquer a series of action-packed challenges. Swing your axe with precision, crush obstacles, and defeat waves of enemies. The game tests your reflexes and accuracy as you navigate through dangerous environments, dodging traps and outsmarting your foes. With each level, the difficulty ramps up, demanding quick thinking and faster reactions to survive. Are you ready to take on the challenge and go axe-crazy?
instructions: Aim your axe at the target using your mouse or touchpad and click to release on desktop and tap on the target to crash it with axe on mobile devices. Your ability to focus and time your throw correctly are critical in progressing through this game. As you move forward, targets become more challenging to hit but offer greater rewards.

title: Mahjong Masters
description: Enter the world of Mahjong Masters, where classic Mahjong meets fast-paced tile matching! In this exciting game, players have 2 minutes to match as many Mahjong tile pairs as possible. Each round is a thrilling battle against a new opponent. Accumulate battle points with each victory to climb the leaderboard and become the ultimate Mahjong Master.
instructions: Computer Mouse: Click to select and match Mahjong tile pairs. Mobile Touchscreen: Tap tiles to select and match pairs. Match as many tile pairs as possible in 2 minutes!

title: Backgammon Deluxe Edition
description: Want to try a different kind of game of luck? Enjoy the best board game of luck, Backgammon Deluxe! Challenge your friend to a game of chance and trust in the dice roll. Roll the dice with all your might and pray for a lucky number! Who will come out on top in the end? Play now, and let's find out!
instructions: Move the pieces around a board. A dice is rolled to determine how far players can move in one turn. The game is won when a player manages to get all their pieces all the way around and off the board.

title: Mermaid Wedding World
description: Mermaid Wedding World is a creative dress-up and decorating game for girls. The princess of the ocean kingdom is getting married to a human and they are going to have a wedding now. You can help prepare the food, set the table, serve the people, and play music. You may help the bride, groom,and other guests to dress up and makeup. You may also decorate the room to your liking.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Princesses of Quadrobics
description: Two beautiful princesses, Eliza and the Little Mermaid, are waiting for your help in creating the perfect images for practicing Quadrobics. First, create a gentle but expressive makeup for each of the girls and put your hair in a comfortable hairstyle. Then choose dresses, jewelry and accessories. But the adventures don't end there! Complete the look by putting masks in the form of adorable animals on the princesses. After all, this is a mandatory part of the Quadrobics trend!
instructions: Help two girlfriends to master a new fashion trend - Quadrobics. Create a stylish image for each of the girls, inspired by a Quadrobics. The result can be saved as a PNG-image. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Juicy Match
description: Tired of candies? Dive into Juicy Match and explore a world of natural, fresh, and juicy delights! You run the best Juice Bar in town, where you match a variety of fruits, from tropical to classic, to create the perfect juice blends. Your cheerful friend, Tiki will guide you with tips and tricks. Match three or more identical fruits to juice them and complete levels. Create chain reactions for extra bonuses and points. Enjoy a refreshing, juicy adventure with Juicy Match!
instructions: Juicy Match is a refreshing Match 3 game. Combine identical fruits and other juicy items into groups of three or more to clear them from the board! Each level has a specific goal you must achieve to advance. Focus on the objective and plan your moves wisely to avoid running out of turns before completing the task. Enjoy the challenge of matching fruits and creating delicious juice blends in this vibrant, fruity adventure!

title: Us Army Car Games Truck Driving
description: Army truck 3d simulator is a realistic military game in which they supply their weapons, foods also use them for the transportation of troops for war and to protect their city from terrorist attacks. Are you looking forward to have an amazing modern army truck driver game to drive your army vehicle and become an army machines driver, as much as you want.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D For player movement.

title: Gladiators. Merge and Fight
description: Gladiators: Merge and Fight is an engaging arcade game that combines character attribute creation and enhancement with combat. In this game, you start with basic materials and improve your gladiator's attributes by upgrading weapon, shield, armor, and helmet materials. Every decision affects your hero's stats. After preparing your gladiator, press the "Start" button to begin the second part of the game: arena battles.
instructions: In the first part of the game, click on a material and drag it to another cell, a character slot, or another material. By pressing the "Craft" button, you can craft a level one material. After your hero is equipped and ready for battle, press the "Battle" button. In the second part of the game, two new buttons become available: "Block" with a shield icon and "Attack" with a sword icon.

title: Gun Evolution
description: Gun Evolution is both a shooting running game and a strategy merge battle game. With 3D cartoon models, you need to merge a power gun to win the battle after the finish line at each level. I recommend shooting the numbered pillars, you can claim money inside and get the items on them. When you earn enough money, you can upgrade the ATK and Speed to destroy more pillars more easily on the track. Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Tanks Merge: Tank War Blitz
description: Embark on an armored adventure in Tanks Merge: Tanks to Attack on the Blitz! - a strategy game where steel giants dominate the world. Immerse yourself in a casual yet addictive tank simulation game designed for those who love war machines and inventive tactics. Have a blitz rumble and defeat all the bosses! Your mission: control a fleet of tanks, each unique in design and to defeat enemies and all bosses on the battlefield.
instructions: Combine identical tanks to get a stronger version, build your tank lineup correctly and go into battle!

title: Fantasy Math Number
description: Embark on an epic adventure in Fantasy Math Number! Test your math skills in exciting battles against monsters by solving addition, subtraction, and multiplication problems. Every correct answer brings you closer to victory! Power up, defeat enemies, and aim for the highest score in this fun and educational math quest!
instructions: Answer the question number with keyboard or on screen number

title: Mega Ramps Ultimate Car Races
description: Mega Ramp Car Stunt Game 2024: Race Car Stunts 3D Enjoy our new mega car driving games with beautiful environments and impossible car games. Indulge in the exciting gameplay of mega ramp car by performing impossible stunts with new car games 2024. Master your driving skills as a mature driver in 3D landscapes of Mega Ramps Ultimate Car Races.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Slope Spooky
description: Slope Spooky is a Halloween-themed! A ball rolling down difficult and eerie slopes is controlled by the players. It's almost Halloween, which means Slope needs some scary stuff!
instructions: Steer the ball with the left/right arrows or A/D keys on your keyboard.

title: Dog Life Simulator
description: Live the life of a dog and see the world through the eyes of your favorite pet! In this original narrative game the tables have turned and now it’s your turn to make the choices as this amazing animal! Will you become man’s best friend and help your owner in their everyday life? Be a perfect pet companion that everyone wishes they had! Care for your pet and make it the happiest puppy in the world! This is the virtual friend you’ve been waiting for… Seen from a completely different perspective.
instructions: Point and click

title: Choco Blocks
description: Enter the delightful world of Choco Blocks, a tantalizing puzzle adventure where strategy meets sweetness! In this engaging game, your task is to pick and drop sets of blocks to complete rows. But there’s a sweet twist: special chocolate blocks are hidden within the rows, waiting to be collected. Your mission is to strategically arrange the blocks and collect all the specific choco blocks from the board before time runs out.
instructions: To play Choco Blocks, use your mouse to click and drag blocks into position. On touch devices, simply tap and slide the blocks to arrange them as needed.

title: Aloha Mahjong
description: Collect all the Hawaiian items in this daily Mahjong at Home game. Try to clear all tiles by pairing the same free Aloha tiles. A tile is free if it is not covered and has at least one free side.
instructions: Click to match same kind of tiles until you clear the board.

title: Find The Missing Part
description: With 100 levels of increasingly challenging puzzles, this game will put your observation skills to the test like never before. Your task is to carefully examine the image and identify the missing sections from a set of 15 options provided. With only seconds to spare, you must make swift and accurate selections to complete the puzzle.
instructions: Click or tap to interact

title: Make America Great Again
description: Take control of a powerful character in the center of the ring, facing waves of wrestlers charging from the right. Your reflexes will be tested as you press directional buttons to deliver well-timed punches and knock out the incoming opponents. As you progress, you'll unlock special abilities that temporarily increase the strength of your punches, allowing you to knock out multiple enemies in a line with a single powerful blow.
instructions: Fight off waves of wrestlers with timed punches!

title: Skinfluencer Beauty Routine
description: Embark on an extraordinary journey of self-expression and embracing imperfections with Skinfluencer Beauty Routine. Guided by Emma, discover the true meaning of beauty from within and embrace confidence in your own skin. Dive into the enchanting world of beauty, fashion, and self-discovery. Unleash your creativity, join Emma's quest to become the ultimate #skinfluencer, and conquer the virtual realm! Experience this brand-new makeover game for girls and let your unique beauty shine through.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Art Master Origins
description: ART MASTERS: ORIGINS - COLORING BOOK is a educational painting game. It is a combination of color by numbers mechanics, with polish artists artworks to discover and the epic atmosphere of RPG games. USP: • Relax and feel like a real artist coloring by numbers every artwork to create legendary paintings! • Fulfill collection of painting’ trophies of every art trend! • Distinguish a falsificate from a real work!
instructions: Show us your sense of art and dive right into the extraordinary universe of Art Game! Explore trends in art and help art collectors to find out if the painting is real or just a copy. Complete your collection of amazing and bizarre pieces of art! A painting used in the cover graphics: Józef Mehoffer, Strange Garden

title: Creepy Dress Up
description: A spooky-fun game where you unleash your creativity by dressing up in eerie costumes. Choose from a wide range of creepy outfits, ghoulish makeup, and spooky accessories. Your mission? Scare the boys and have fun watching their reactions in this fun-filled, frightfully stylish game.
instructions: Dress up the girl in the correct way to scare the boy

title: Master Addiction Solitaire
description: Challenge yourself and take on this brain teaser of a solitaire game! Masterfully rearrange the cards so they end up in ascending order, from A to 6 If you need some help, there are hints, undos, and shuffle that you can use
instructions: To win, you'll need to arrange all the cards of the same suit in an ascending order, from A to 6. To do so, you'll need to move the cards from their original spot to an empty one, but there's a catch - a card can fill in a blank position only if it is greater in value and of the same suit as the card on its left.

title: ASMR Beauty Homeless
description: One of our patrons came in today with her homeless friend, Anna, who is in need of urgent hygiene care. Let’s assist the doctor in cleaning her body, teeth, and the area around her piercing. After the treatment, style her in the best outfit!
instructions: Use MOUSE to play the game.

title: Space Shooter - Speed Typing Challenge
description: Get ready for an exciting space adventure that helps you improve your typing skills! In this free educational online word game, you'll pilot a spaceship and face waves of enemies. It's a fun way to boost your typing speed and accuracy. Jump into your spaceship, start typing, and help save the galaxy one word at a time! Think you're the fastest typist in the galaxy? Prove it! The universe is counting on you - start your adventure now and become the ultimate space hero!
instructions: Type to Fire: As enemies appear, words will pop up near them. Type these words quickly and correctly to fire your weapons and destroy the enemy ships.

title: 2048Skill Edition
description: Ini adalah permainan kesenangan untuk 2.048, dan terutama kami telah menambahkan permainan dan keterampilan baru yang memungkinkan pengguna untuk mengalami 2048 berbeda.
instructions: Permainan ini terutama mengontrol arah tembakan bola untuk menghilangkan bola
developer: Shenzhen haikuo yuntour rede tecnologia co., LTD

title: Angry Flappy
description: "Angry Flappy is a fast-paced twist on the classic game, where players not only navigate through obstacles but also shoot bullets to destroy enemies and barriers. Get ready for an action-packed flying adventure!"
instructions: Instructions for Angry Flappy : Tap to fly/flap and control your bird's movement. Shoot bullets to destroy obstacles and enemies in your path. Avoid crashing into obstacles to stay in the game

title: Crazy Hill Climbing
description: Get ready for the ultimate hill racing adventure in Crazy Hill Climbing! Race through steep hills, rugged terrains, and tackle challenging obstacles. With 15 unique levels and cars to unlock, upgrade your vehicles and customize your rides as you strive to conquer each track and perform daring stunts. * Use coins to upgrade your engine, tires, suspension, and more to improve performance on rough terrains * Execute daring front flips and back flips to earn extra points and boost your score
instructions: Keyboard Controls: A / Left Arrow - Brake D / Right Arrow - Gas Mobile Controls: Gas/Brake Pedals

title: Pirates Mahjong
description: Pirates Mahjong is a classic tile-matching game featuring challenging levels. Match pairs of pirate-themed tiles to clear the board, solve puzzles, and uncover hidden tiles along the way. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts and pirate fans alike, Pirates Mahjong offers endless fun and excitement on the high seas!
instructions: Use your mouse or touchpad to click on matching pairs of pirate-themed tiles to clear them from the board.

title: Ultimate Transport Driving Sim
description: The realistic and enjoyable driving characteristics of Ultimate automobile Driving Simulator combine to make it the best automobile driving simulator for mobile devices. The best driving physics are found in the best vehicle driving simulator! All types of vehicles, from off-road SUVs to race automobiles, have their unique physics!
instructions: Use W,A,S,D player movement.

title: Hazmob FPS
description: Hazmob FPS is an intense first-person shooter that blends tactical depth with fast-paced action. Players engage in strategic, team-based battles across diverse maps, utilizing customizable loadouts and a variety of game modes. With its dynamic gameplay mechanics, realistic graphics, and competitive ranked play, Hazmob FPS challenges players to master their skills, coordinate with teammates, and outwit opponents in a visually immersive and constantly evolving environment.
instructions: WASD = move Space = jump Left mouse / K = shoot Right mouse / L = aim P = leaderboard, pause, and settings G = pick up the gun C = crouch Shift = run 1, 2, 3 = switch weapons 4, 5, 6 = skills E = alternative skills Q = alternative skills

title: Wordmeister HD
description: Create words in the English dictionary to score points. Drag and drop the tiles to form words. Take advantage of bonus tiles such as double letter scores, triple word scores and more. How well-versed are you with the English vocabulary? The highest score wins!
instructions: Create words to score points

title: Turbo Race 3D
description: Get ready for intense action in Turbo Race 3D! Upgrade your car’s speed, acceleration, grip, and brakes to dominate the competition. Use shields and boosters to gain an edge, and customize your ride with decals and colors. Race through 3 exciting worlds—city, desert, and snow—while evading traffic and outpacing opponents on thrilling highways. Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate racer?
instructions: Use the arrow keys to turn left, right, or brake. Activate the shield to become invulnerable, and use nitro to boost your speed!

title: Head Basketball
description: With exceptional shots, Head Basketball is a simple yet entertaining basketball game. The ball must be shot into the hoop of your opponent. Two points for each shot. It is imperative that you surpass your rivals in points before the time runs out.
instructions: Use arrow keys to move Z, X to throw

title: Hole Eat Grow Attack
description: Eat objects, and ammos, and attack other holes around. Two unique game modes, time attack and infinite modes are waiting for you. Let your hole battle begin in the arena against the other holes. The game consists of two levels Time Attack and Infinite. There are more than 20 characters. You can play the game either in single-player mode or in 2 player mode. Pick your hole fighter and start the game. You can activate player 2 with keys. Make sure you avoid larger-hole enemies around.
instructions: Player 1: Move by using the W, A, S, D keys. Boost: C Key Player 2: Move by ARROW KEYS Boost: L Key

title: Mahjong Adventure: World Quest
description: Welcome traveler, to the most epic quest of all time! Test your Mahjong skills as you journey across the world. It's time to put everything on the line as you challenge these intriguing yet challenging levels. Complete the quest and witness the wonders of the world. How quickly can you match the Mahjong tiles? Come play now and let's find out!
instructions: Tap on two identical tiles to match them. Match all the tiles and remove them from the playing field before time runs out. Unlock new levels as you progress.

title: Army Truck Driver Online
description: Take control of a cargo army truck in a military game and deliver high-ranking soldiers to their camp. Carrying out your assignment as an army truck driver cargo in this military game is no easy feat, especially when you're an officer. The highways are filled with hazards and obstacles.
instructions: Instructions: Drive the military vehicle around the army bases and accomplish the missions in each level. Pick up passengers, reach on time, transport weapons from one place to another. Controls: WASD to drive Spacebar to brake F Interact

title: Crazy Plane Landing
description: Flying is easy - but can you stick the landing? Get into one of the amazing flying machines and launch as high as you can. This part is easy… well, fairly easy. Not that anyone can do it. But you can. Surely you do! What’s really interesting is what happens next. Will you crash? Or will you somehow make it a perfect landing?
instructions: Use the Mouse button to launch and control the boost. Use the mouse and AD keyboard keys to steer the plane.

title: Falling Art Ragdoll Simulator
description: The harder they fall, the more points they get! Jump in and enjoy the beauty of falling art! Because let’s be honest - there is nothing more satisfying than watching someone hurt themselves in the most dumb and ridiculous way. Especially when that someone is a 3d model with ragdoll physics and you don’t need to feel sorry for it at all! Just enjoy our crazy game, have fun, and stay safe!
instructions: Mouse / Keyboard

title: Get Ready With Me: Concert Day
description: Join us in the excitement as you follow the thrilling journey of teen Riri, who is preparing for the concert of a lifetime. From choosing the perfect outfit to applying stunning makeup, you'll get to walk her through all the steps of this beautifying process. But before you start the fun, be sure to help her customize her cowgirl hat, a signature item for the concert she will attend. Then go crazy with the makeup, dress her up in a jaw-dropping outfit, and accessorize for a complete look.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game.

title: Stunt Multiplayer Arena
description: Go solo in a free roam challenge where you can pull off incredible stunts like front and backflips. Navigate icy and dirt tracks as you push various vehicles to their limits. In the multiplayer derby mode, choose your vehicle—whether it's a car, truck, or van—and engage in a fierce survival derby. Compete against all other vehicles in an intense, smashing battle. Jump into the action today and see if you have what it takes to rule the arena!
instructions: Use the Arrow Keys or WASD to drive and balance the car. Press SHIFT for a nitro boost, SPACE for the handbrake, and CTRL to switch cars. Press P to fullscreen, R to reset the car, and B to look back. Use M for the rearview mirror and U for KHM/MPH. On the soccer field, press C to jump.

title: Only Up Balls
description: An exciting journey begins as you try to reach the top! The aim of the Only Up Balls game is to get your ball to the roof of various platforms by jumping from the tracks. The game first starts with the "Noob" sections and allows you to learn the mechanics. Then prove your mastery level with the "Pro" and "Hacker" sections. Finally, push the limits with the "Extreme" section!
instructions: Player 1 Movement: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "SPACE" Respawn: "R" Player 2 Movement: "ARROW KEYS" Jump: "K" Respawn: "L"
